statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND password = 'password123';
SELECT id, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE password LIKE '%password%';
SELECT id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT auth.token, users.username FROM auth INNER JOIN users ON users.user_id = auth.user_id;
SELECT users.username, auth.token FROM users INNER JOIN auth ON users.user_id = auth.user_id WHERE users.user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT users.username, COUNT(auth.auth_id) AS token_count FROM users LEFT JOIN auth ON users.user_id = auth.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM authentication ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, up.first_name, up.last_name, a.login_time FROM users u JOIN user_profiles up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN authentication a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS logins FROM users u JOIN authentication a ON u.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT up.first_name, up.last_name, up.date_of_birth, up.city, up.country, a.login_time FROM user_profiles up JOIN authentication a ON up.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, profile_pic FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE '%_user%';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role IN ('admin', 'moderator');
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email, profile_pic FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_passwords INNER JOIN user_profiles ON user_passwords.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM login_history WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM sessions);
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT username, password, email FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id WHERE permissions.permission_level > 3;
